title: CDC Urges Schools to Welcome Kids Back, Vaccinated or Not
content:
1. CDC Urges Schools to Welcome Kids Back, Vaccinated or Not  The Wall Street Journal
  2. CDC: Vaccinated teachers and students don't need masks inside school buildings  WPTZ
  3. Updated CDC schools guidance prioritizes in-person learning, even if all Covid-19 safety measures aren't in place  CNN
  4. Opinion | The CDC's latest school guidelines are not perfect, but they're better than expected  The Washington Post
  5. Illinois eases COVID-19 school rules following CDC move  Chicago Tribune
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: CDC、学校側にワクチン接種の有無にかかわらず子供たちの復帰を促す
